tok:
---
layout: _layouts/bt/lili.html
title: ilo sitelen
external: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Jami_taking_a_photo_on_Angel_Island.jpg
name: Jami taking a photo on Angel Island
source: Frank Schulenburg
license:  CC BY-SA 3.0
alt: A person using a camera with a very long lens.
media: "/toki-pona/beginner-material/assets/lili-2.jpg"
tags: lili
---

mama mi li jo e ilo. 

ilo li ken pali e sitelen. 

ilo li mani mute. 

mi wile kepeken ilo. 

taso, mama li wile ala e ni. 

mi awen, mi awen, mi awen.

tenpo ni la, mama li lukin ala. 

mi tawa ilo. mi wile kama jo e ilo. 

taso ilo li suli! luka mi li lili. 

ilo li tawa anpa. pakala a!
en:
My parent has a tool.

The tool can make an image.

The tool is very valuable.

I want to use the tool.

But, my parent does not want this. 

I wait, I wait, I wait. 

At this time, my parent is not watching.  

I go to the tool. I want to come to have the tool.

But the tool is big! My hands are small.

The tool goes down. Destruction, oh!
